feed.title: blank
feed.subtitle: A simple, whitespace theme for academics. Based on [*folio](https://github.com/bogoli/-folio) design.

entry.title: Improving Reliable Navigation under Uncertainty with Non-Local Information Informed Predictions

link.title: Improving Reliable Navigation under Uncertainty with Non-Local Information Informed Predictions

entry.summary: We improve reliable, long-horizon, goal-directed navigation in partially-mapped environments by using non- locally available information to predict the goodness of temporally-extended actions that enter unseen space.
